basics.name: Chris Joseph
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer
summary: A young Full Stack Web Developer from the Dominican Republic. Independently mastering front-end and back-end technologies, my projects reflect a commitment to continuous learning. I aspire to contribute meaningfully to the global web development community, marking the beginning of an exciting journey.

My passion for web development propels me towards new heights, combining knowledge with innovation. With a thirst for learning and a knack for problem-solving, I'm actively shaping the digital landscape. Anticipate the impact of my contributions in the ever-evolving realm of Full Stack Web Development.

work.name: WebCrafters Inc.
work.summary: Contributed expertise in front-end development to create visually appealing and responsive websites. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality web solutions.
highlights: Implemented modern front-end frameworks such as React to enhance user interfaces.
Led the optimization efforts resulting in a 20% improvement in website loading times.

work.name: CodeNinjas Agency
work.summary: Engaged in end-to-end development, from server-side logic to user interface implementation. Successfully delivered scalable and robust web applications tailored to clients' specific needs.
highlights: Developed custom API integrations to enhance the functionality of client websites.
Collaborated with design teams to ensure seamless integration of UI/UX elements.

courses: Gestion, mantenimiento y creacion de base de datos
Desarrollo, implementation y despliegue de Software
